provisions.title: Section 7
provisions.content:
7. A foreign government, or foreign organization, shall waives.
have the right and duty to waive any immunity granted
in respect of any such government or organization or any
representative or expert thereof in any case where the
immunity would impede the course of justice and it can be
waived without prejudice to the interests of the foreign
government or foreign organization.
